definition: to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)

sentences.english: The key to following your heart is to learn to deal with fear.
sentences.chinese: 要做到心随所愿，秘诀在于学会克服恐惧。

sentences.english: The secret of a good old age is simply an honorable pact with solitude.
sentences.chinese: 安度晚年的秘诀，就是和孤独签订体面的协议。

sentences.english: It's a recipe for overeating, Sandquist said.
sentences.chinese: 这是不吃得过多的秘诀”，Sandquist说。

sentences.english: This is the secret of success.
David says the real secret to his vitality is what he eats.
sentences.chinese: 大卫说其实他精力充沛的真正秘诀是他吃的食物。

sentences.english: As you may know, I send out a “Success Tip” every Sunday to those of you who have signed-up to receive my success tips.
sentences.chinese: 我每周末发一条“成功秘诀”给那些已经签约的人。

sentences.english: I asked Chen Shichu about his secret recipe on bun-making, when we got familiar with each other.
sentences.chinese: 笔者和陈世初熟之后，问他做包子的秘诀。

sentences.english: To follow, without hait, only one aim! That's the secret of success.
sentences.chinese: 不停顿的向目标前进，这就是成功的秘诀。

sentences.english: So, what’s the secret to successful community building?
sentences.chinese: 那么，什么是成功的社区建设的秘诀？

sentences.english: Karen. Wow - congratulations. What is the secret to your success?
sentences.chinese: 喔，那可要恭喜你了。你能成功有什么秘诀么？

sentences.english: Irve now got the hang of learning English verbs.
sentences.chinese: 我已经找到学习英语动词的秘诀了。

sentences.english: Move is a healthy source, is also a long-lived secret.
sentences.chinese: 动是健康的源泉，也是长寿的秘诀。

sentences.english: The secret of domestic bliss is having two daughters, according to a study.
sentences.chinese: 根据一项研究，家庭幸福的秘诀是有两个女儿。

sentences.english: Self-trust is the first secret to success.
sentences.chinese: 自信是成功的第一个秘诀。

sentences.english: Hof said he survives by controlling his body temperature through tantric meditation.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫声称他幸存的秘诀是通过密教沉思来控制体温。

sentences.english: The secret to light decorating is finding the right balance for the room.
sentences.chinese: 灯饰装璜的秘诀在于找到合乎居室的平衡点。

definition: a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
the key trick/the secret of success
smart move/clever way of doing sth
the one and only way/the only proper course to take
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
to grasp (often fig.)/to control/to seize (initiative, opportunity, destiny)/to master/to know well/to understand sth well and know how to use it/fluency
